turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to order some coffee to pick up at a local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in here in Fort Worth, Texas, the Starbucks on North Beach and Western Center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd actually like that iced, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and for milk, did you want whole or another type?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Milk would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, could you repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order of 1 grande iced caramel macchiato from starbucks in forth worth texas on north beach and western center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: comes out to $4.50. should i place it now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add whipped to that and after that? Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i've added whipped cream to your order. the total is the same, $4.50. i'll place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the drink will be ready in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
